alert.note: Alert for Pulaski (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 1:57PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Lonoke and northeastern Pulaski Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 157 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Jacksonville, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... North Little Rock... Sherwood... Jacksonville... Cabot... Lonoke... Little Rock AFB... McCreanor... Parnell... Gravel Ridge... Sisemore... Meto... McAlmont... South Bend... Gibson... Baucum... Furlow... Woodlawn... Kerr... Galloway... Fairview in Lonoke County... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
